title: Birth of the red kangaroo
brief_description: Shows mating, the female kangaroo’s preparation for the birth of her young and birth itself. Explains the significance of the oestrous cycle and gestation period, egg fertilization, and the development of the embryo in the uterus. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
